utilisationCalculator.title: Calculate Utilisation
utilisationCalculator.subtitle: Enter your hours for the period to calculate your utilisation rate
utilisationCalculator.information: Utilisation rate is the percentage of total working hours that are billable. Industry best practice targets 70% - 80% to allow time for professional development, administrative tasks, and strategic work

endDate.label: End Date
endDate.mustBeAfterStart: End Date must be after Start Date

totalHours.label: Total Hours Worked
totalHours.mustBeNumber: Total Hours must be a number
totalHours.minValue: Total Hours must be at least 0.01
totalHours.maxValue: Total Hours cannot exceed 8760 (hours in a year)

billableHours.label: Billable Hours
billableHours.mustBeNumber: Billable Hours must be a number
billableHours.minNonZero: Billable Hours must be 0 or at least 0.01
billableHours.exceedsTotal: Billable Hours cannot exceed Total Hours

targetUtilisation.label: Target Utilisation (%)
targetUtilisation.mustBeNumber: Target Utilisation must be a number
targetUtilisation.minValue: Target Utilisation must be at least 1%

results.title: Result
results.messageSuccess: Excellent work! You're meeting or exceeding your utilisation target
results.messageWarning: Consider reviewing your workload allocation and billable opportunities

utilisationHistory.title: Utilisation History
utilisationHistory.information: View all your previously calculated utilisation records. Delete entries to manage your history
